text: Hjorthagen is a district in the northeastern part of central Stockholm, located near Ropsten and Lidingöbron. Since 1997, Hjorthagen has been part of Östermalm district. ==District== Hjorthagen belongs to Östermalm district, it had around 8,000 inhabitants in 2017 and is estimated to have over 17,000 inhabitants by year 2027. The district borders Ladugårdsgärdet and Norra Djurgården. ==References== Category:Stockholm
title: Hjorthagen
